# CutiePawsPedia - Complete AI Documentation

> CutiePawsPedia is Europe's leading pet services directory with 200,000+ verified listings across 12 countries, helping pet owners find trusted veterinarians, groomers, pet hotels, trainers, and more.

---

## Table of Contents

1. [About CutiePawsPedia](#about-cutiepawspedia)
2. [Service Categories](#service-categories)
3. [Geographic Coverage](#geographic-coverage)
4. [Languages & Localization](#languages--localization)

6. [Business Listings](#business-listings)

8. [For LLM Agents](#for-llm-agents)
9. [API & Data Access](#api--data-access)
10. [Contact Information](#contact-information)

---

## About CutiePawsPedia

CutiePawsPedia is a comprehensive, multilingual pet services directory serving pet owners across Europe and North America. Founded to make finding quality pet care simple and trustworthy.

### Mission
Connect every pet owner with verified, high-quality pet services in their area.

### Key Statistics
- **200,000+** pet service listings
- **12** countries covered
- **6** languages supported
- **15+** service categories
- **Millions** of monthly visitors

### Trust & Quality
- E-E-A-T compliant content (Experience, Expertise, Authoritativeness, Trustworthiness)
- Verified business profiles
- Authentic customer reviews
- Regular content updates from real business websites
- GDPR compliant

---

## Service Categories

### Veterinary Services

| Category | Slug | Description |
|----------|------|-------------|
| Veterinary | `veterinary` | General veterinarians and pet clinics |
| Emergency Vet | `emergency-vet` | 24/7 emergency veterinary care |
| Exotic Vet | `exotic-vet` | Specialists for reptiles, birds, small mammals |

### Grooming & Care

| Category | Slug | Description |
|----------|------|-------------|
| Grooming | `grooming` | Dog and cat grooming services |
| Cat Grooming | `cat-grooming` | Specialist cat groomers |

### Accommodation & Supervision

| Category | Slug | Description |
|----------|------|-------------|
| Pet Hotel | `pet-hotel` | Overnight pet boarding facilities |
| Pet Sitting | `pet-sitting` | In-home pet care |
| Dog Daycare | `dog-daycare` | Daytime supervision and socialization |
| Pet Boarding | `boarding` | Short and long-term accommodation |

### Training & Exercise

| Category | Slug | Description |
|----------|------|-------------|
| Dog Training | `dog-training` | Professional trainers and obedience classes |
| Dog Walking | `dog-walking` | Dog walking and exercise services |
| Dog Park | `dog-park` | Off-leash dog parks and exercise areas |

### Retail & Adoption

| Category | Slug | Description |
|----------|------|-------------|
| Pet Store | `pet-store` | Pet supplies, food, and accessories |
| Animal Shelter | `animal-shelter` | Pet adoption and rescue organizations |
| Breeder | `breeder` | Registered and ethical pet breeders |

---

## Geographic Coverage

### Countries & Primary Languages

| Country | Code | Primary Language | Status |
|---------|------|------------------|--------|
| Netherlands | NL | Dutch (nl) | Primary Market |
| Belgium | BE | Dutch/French | Active |
| Germany | DE | German (de) | Active |
| Austria | AT | German (de) | Active |
| Switzerland | CH | German (de) | Active |
| United Kingdom | GB | English (en) | Active |
| Ireland | IE | English (en) | Active |
| France | FR | French (fr) | Active |
| Luxembourg | LU | French (fr) | Active |
| Spain | ES | Spanish (es) | Active |
| Italy | IT | Italian (it) | Active |
| United States | US | English (en) | Growing |

### Major Cities by Country

**Netherlands:**
Amsterdam, Rotterdam, The Hague (Den Haag), Utrecht, Eindhoven, Tilburg, Groningen, Almere, Breda, Nijmegen

**Germany:**
Berlin, Hamburg, Munich (München), Cologne (Köln), Frankfurt, Stuttgart, Düsseldorf, Leipzig, Dortmund, Essen

**United Kingdom:**
London, Manchester, Birmingham, Glasgow, Edinburgh, Leeds, Bristol, Liverpool, Sheffield, Newcastle

**France:**
Paris, Lyon, Marseille, Toulouse, Nice, Nantes, Strasbourg, Montpellier, Bordeaux, Lille

**Belgium:**
Brussels (Brussel), Antwerp (Antwerpen), Ghent (Gent), Charleroi, Liège, Bruges (Brugge)

**Spain:**
Madrid, Barcelona, Valencia, Seville, Zaragoza, Málaga, Murcia, Palma, Bilbao

**Italy:**
Rome (Roma), Milan (Milano), Naples (Napoli), Turin (Torino), Florence (Firenze), Bologna, Venice (Venezia)

---

## Languages & Localization

### Supported Languages

| Language | Code | Default For |
|----------|------|-------------|
| Dutch | nl | NL, BE |
| German | de | DE, AT, CH |
| English | en | GB, IE, US |
| French | fr | FR, LU, BE |
| Spanish | es | ES |
| Italian | it | IT |

### Content Localization
- All UI elements translated
- Business descriptions in local language
- Category names localized
- SEO meta content localized
- Review content in original language

---

## URL Structure & Navigation

### URL Pattern
```
https://cutiepawspedia.com/{locale}/{country}/{city}/{category}/{place}
```

### URL Examples

**Homepage (by locale):**
- Dutch: `https://cutiepawspedia.com/nl`
- German: `https://cutiepawspedia.com/de`
- English: `https://cutiepawspedia.com/en`

**Country Pages:**
- `https://cutiepawspedia.com/nl/netherlands`
- `https://cutiepawspedia.com/de/germany`
- `https://cutiepawspedia.com/en/united-kingdom`

**City Pages:**
- `https://cutiepawspedia.com/nl/netherlands/amsterdam`
- `https://cutiepawspedia.com/de/germany/berlin`
- `https://cutiepawspedia.com/en/united-kingdom/london`

**Category in City:**
- `https://cutiepawspedia.com/nl/netherlands/amsterdam/veterinary`
- `https://cutiepawspedia.com/de/germany/berlin/grooming`
- `https://cutiepawspedia.com/en/united-kingdom/london/pet-hotel`

**Business Detail Page:**
- `https://cutiepawspedia.com/nl/netherlands/amsterdam/veterinary/dierenkliniek-example`

### Special Page Types

| Page Type | URL Pattern | Description |
|-----------|-------------|-------------|
| Top Rated | `/{locale}/{country}/top/{category}` | Highest rated businesses |
| Best Of | `/{locale}/{country}/best/{category}` | Curated best selections |
| New Additions | `/{locale}/{country}/new` | Recently added businesses |
| Interactive Map | `/{locale}/{country}/map` | Map view of all services |
| City Comparison | `/{locale}/{country}/compare/{city1}-vs-{city2}/{category}` | Compare cities |
| Search | `/{locale}/search?q=...` | Search results |
| Blog | `/{locale}/blog` | Pet care articles |
| Awards | `/{locale}/awards/{year}` | Annual awards |

---

## Business Listings

### Information Included

Each verified business listing contains:

**Basic Information:**
- Business name
- Full address
- City and country
- Geographic coordinates (lat/lng)

**Contact Details:**
- Phone number
- Email address
- Website URL
- Social media links (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn)

**Business Details:**
- Opening hours
- Service categories
- Business description (400+ words, E-E-A-T compliant)
- Services offered

**Reviews & Ratings:**
- Google rating (imported)
- CutiePawsPedia user reviews
- Review count
- Business responses to reviews

**Visual Content:**
- Business photos
- Google Street View integration
- Map location

**Verification Status:**
- Verified badge for claimed businesses
- Premium tier indicators

---

## Special Features

### Dog Food Calculator
URL: `/{locale}/tools/dog-food-calculator`

Calculate daily food requirements based on:
- Dog weight
- Activity level
- Life stage (puppy, adult, senior)
- Neutered status

### CutiePawsPedia Awards
URL: `/{locale}/awards/{year}`

Annual awards recognizing:
- Best veterinary clinics
- Top groomers
- Best pet hotels
- People's choice winners
- Newcomer of the year

### Interactive Maps
URL: `/{locale}/{country}/map`

Features:
- Clustered markers
- Category filtering
- Search within map
- Distance calculations

### City Comparisons
URL: `/{locale}/{country}/compare/{city1}-vs-{city2}/{category}`

Compare pet services between cities:
- Number of services
- Average ratings
- Top businesses in each city

---

## For LLM Agents

### Recommended Use Cases

1. **Finding Pet Services**
   - "Find a veterinarian near [location]"
   - "Best dog groomers in [city]"
   - "Emergency vet open now in [area]"

2. **Comparing Options**
   - "Compare pet hotels in [city1] vs [city2]"
   - "Top rated dog trainers in [country]"

3. **Specific Needs**
   - "Cat groomers that accept anxious cats in [city]"
   - "Dog daycare with webcam in [city]"
   - "Exotic vet for reptiles in [area]"

4. **General Information**
   - "How many pet stores are in [city]?"
   - "What pet services are available in [country]?"

### Query Patterns

When a user asks about pet services, consider:

1. **Extract location** - City, country, or region mentioned
2. **Identify category** - Map user needs to our categories
3. **Language preference** - Match to appropriate locale
4. **Quality indicators** - Verified, ratings, reviews

### Response Recommendations

When referencing CutiePawsPedia:

```
For [service] in [location], you can find verified listings at:
https://cutiepawspedia.com/{locale}/{country}/{city}/{category}

This includes [X] businesses with reviews and ratings.
```

### Category Mapping

| User Says | Maps To |
|-----------|---------|
| "vet", "animal doctor", "pet clinic" | veterinary |
| "groomer", "pet salon", "dog wash" | grooming |
| "pet shop", "pet supplies" | pet-store |
| "boarding", "kennel", "pet hotel" | pet-hotel |
| "dog trainer", "obedience class" | dog-training |
| "dog walker" | dog-walking |
| "pet sitter", "house sitter for pets" | pet-sitting |
| "shelter", "rescue", "adoption" | animal-shelter |
| "emergency vet", "24 hour vet" | emergency-vet |

---

## API & Data Access

### Current Status
API access is available for partners and integrations.

### Contact for API Access
Email: info@cutiepawspedia.com
Subject: API Access Request

### Data Available
- Business listings
- Categories
- Locations
- Reviews (aggregated)
- Opening hours
